Grainsmart Cafe

GrainSmart Café: Indulge in our wide range of mindful beverages, including Hot and Cold Coffee, signature Milk Teas, delicious Frappes, and fresh Juices. We pioneered healthier sipping, featuring drinks like our Brown Rice Coffee naturally sweetened with Stevia.

Grainsmart Majada Out

Water Station

GrainSmart Water Station: We ensure your family is hydrated with the purest water possible. Our station features advanced Reverse Osmosis (RO) technology, providing you with clean, safe drinking water for your home.

Grocery & Quick Meal Stop

The GrainSmart Grocery & Quick Meal Stop: Need a quick grocery item or a satisfying meal? We have you covered. We offer essential grocery goods and a delicious menu of budget-friendly rice meals, perfect for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

GrainSmart Café, Water Station & Grocery:

Welcome to GrainSmart Café, located in the heart of Purok 3, Majada Out, Calamba City, Laguna. We are your one-stop shop dedicated to making healthy living convenient and delicious. We've built a unique establishment that caters to your every need, from hydration to hunger.

Join the GrainSmart Community

Grainsmart Reverse Osmosis (RO) Water Water Station

At GrainSmart, our commitment to your wellness extends beyond our grain-based coffee and healthy treats. We are proud to feature the GrainSmart Water Station, utilizing advanced Reverse Osmosis (RO) technology to provide you with the cleanest, purest drinking water available. Just as we ensure quality in every sip of our brown rice coffee, we guarantee unmatched purity in the water you bring home. GrainSmart: Healthy living, inside and out.

GrainSmart Quick Meal Promotion

Stop by our Grocery & Quick Meal Stop for a satisfying, budget-friendly meal that won't compromise your well-being! Enjoy a full rice meal of your choice for only P99 (All-in) which includes: Your chosen Rice Meal , One serving of GrainSmart Fruit Juice

GrainSmart Café: Your Destination for Healthy Indulgence

We founded GrainSmart Café on a simple, powerful belief: that you shouldn't have to choose between delicious treats and a healthy lifestyle. Our mission is to support your journey toward healthy living by serving drinks and treats made with quality ingredients and mindful preparation.
